title.rendered: Consoles, computers and mobile phones to play games, keyboards… You will find the best gaming solutions at Vodafone

content.rendered:
And it is that Vodafone offers a catalog and where you will find everything you need to enjoy a complete gaming experience. The best of all? That all the products available in your portfolio can be paid in 36 or 24 installments comfortably and without interest. In addition to connectivity that allows maximum fiber speeds, with low latency and mobile connectivity in the best 5G mobile network, all to have the best gaming experience.

Take the opportunity to buy consoles in installments at Vodafone

In Vodafone you have the possibility of buying the Xbox Series S in its pack and that includes Fortnite at a price from 9 euros per month. A powerful console that will more than meet your expectations.

Nintendo Switch Pack Gaming at the best price

Looking for a portable model? The Nintendo Switch Pack Gaming, which comes with Super Mario Odyssey, Animal Crossing and six different accessories, can be obtained from 12.75 euros per month on Vodafone.

A product that you can now get for less than you imagine and that will allow you to enjoy your favorite games wherever you want thanks to its particular design. What are you waiting for to bring out your most gamer side!

Gaming Millennium Pack: MD34 PRO Monitor and Sona MM1 Mini PC

If you are looking for a gaming PC, don’t miss out on this Gaming Millennium Monitor MD34 PRO and PC MM1 Mini pack, the perfect combination to enjoy your favorite games and that you can find on Vodafone from 42 euros per month.

On one side you will have a monitor MD34 Pro with curved screen so you can enjoy the best immersion through its 34” VA-type panel to offer more accurate color reproduction. Highlight its refresh rate of 144 Hz, perfect for gamers.

To this must be added the powerful PC MM1 Mini RRX7N, a model that has an AMD Ryzen 5 2600 processor, 8 GB of RAM and a 4 GB AMD RX 570 graphics card so you can play titles like Fortnite without any problem. You can enjoy the best games with an unmatched Frames per second rate, The Witcher 3 reaches a performance of 71 FPS.

Millenium Desktop Sona Ryzen 5

You can also get this powerful Millenium Sona Ryzen 5 desktop computer at a very attractive price. A high-end gaming PC that you can buy from 46.75 euros per month.

East computer to play It boasts the best features, including an AMD Ryzen 5 processor along with 16 GB of RAM so you can enjoy your favorite games in the best quality.

OZONE DSP24240 24″ UHD Gaming Monitor

If you are looking for a gaming monitor, OZONE has the perfect model for you. Behind an impossible-to-pronounce name hides a product that boasts a 24-inch diagonal and UHD resolution.

Highlight its base, which allows you to tilt and rotate the monitor depending on your needs, in addition to having VESA support so you can hang it on the wall. Finally, it offers an HDMI connector (cable included), a Display Port 1.2 (cable included), a USB connection and also an audio jack. Its price? You can get it on Vodafone from just 6.30 euros per month.

OZONE Pack Gaming Vodafone

We continue with OZONE to recommend a gaming package that you can buy from 3.60 euros per month and that comes with everything you need, including a mouse, keyboard and gaming mat so you can play in the best conditions.

In addition, the keyboard is backlit, so you can play at night in the most comfortable way. Do you prefer to buy this peripheral separately? Know that you can get it from 2.40 euros per month.

Gaming headset OZONE Nuke Pro 7.1

We could not forget the OZONE Nuke Pro 7.1 gaming headphones, a model that you will find at a very attractive price, it can be purchased from 1.80 euros per month on Vodafone.

In addition to having a professional and discreet design, they are very light since they weigh 297 grams so you can play for hours. Note that with these gaming headphones they offer 7.1 sound so you can live a more immersive experience through quality and surround sound.

Schneider Sound Bar 2.0 30W

If you want to enjoy the best gaming experience, in addition to having a team that lives up to expectations, you need to have an acoustic landscape that is up to the task and that allows you to detect the position of your enemies. And a great option to consider is this Schneider sound bar.

A product that boasts a remote control so you can control the volume to your liking, Bluetooth connectivity to link all kinds of devices and 30W of power. Its price? You can get it from 3.60 euros per month.

Red Magic 6 5G

The RedMagic 6 5G is one of the best gaming phones on the market. A model that boasts a power beyond any doubt. We will start by talking about its 6.8-inch 2,400 x 1,080-pixel screen made up of an AMOLED panel with a 165Hz refresh rate to offer the best gaming experience.

To this must be added 12 GB of RAM and 256 GB of storagetogether with the powerful processor Snapdragon 888 so you can play the most cutting-edge games like COD: Mobile or PUBG without any problem.

A very interesting product that you can get from Vodafone from 16 euros per month. And eye, what comes with three gifts so you don’t have to buy any accessories.

  • wireless game pad: User-friendly design to play like a pro, with a rubber coating to ensure your grip for hours of play. Easy setup via Bluetooth. Valued at 31.90 euros
  • Case: For you to carry your mobile protected with the most gamer design. Valued at 14.90 euros
  • RedMagic Cyberpods Headphones: 39 milliseconds of latency that enhances the experience while you play. Valued at 49.90 euros

Red Magic 6 Lite 5G

Another great option to take into account is the RedMagic 6 Lite 5G, which you will find at Vodafone from 10 euros per month, with the gift pack to complete the gaming experience: Wireless Gamepad, Case to protect your protected mobile and RedMagic Cyberpods headphones. It is a little less powerful than its older brother, but it still boasts perfect features for gaming, such as its 6.65-inch Full HD+ AMOLED display and with a refresh rate of 144 Hz.

To this we must add a processor Snapdragon 765G along with 8 GB of RAM and 256 GB of internal storage. And yes, it comes with the three gift accessories like the previous model so you don’t have to worry about anything.
